title: Discover our coaching and mentoring opportunities: supporting GSE members with Professional Recognition

content.text: The Government Science and Engineering (GSE) Profession leads the way in championing the benefits of mentoring, promoting best practice and recognising its contribution towards professional development, diversity and career growth.

Our 2021 strategy demonstrates our commitment to mentoring for GSE members. Mentoring is especially vital for helping colleagues achieve Professional Recognition, building confidence, and establishing networks across their field.

If you enjoy supporting others and want to make a meaningful impact throughout the Civil Service, becoming a coach or mentor to other GSE members is a rewarding way to enhance skills. If you’re a GSE member and interested in becoming a mentor, please get in touch with us.
Mentoring towards Professional Recognition: how it works

For Professional Recognition, we aim to provide a mentor to all members on our express cohort. You can find information on express cohorts in our Professional Recognition support booklet. If you would like a copy of this booklet, please email us at gse@go-science.gov.uk.  Mentors will be GSE Profession members who are chartered status (or higher) ideally by the same professional organisation as the applicant. Mentors will provide support and advice while you build your portfolio and make your application. We aim to provide a one-to-one mentor/mentee ratio where possible, depending on the number of mentors.
What other mentoring options are available and how do I apply?
The GSE Profession have different mentoring and peer support offers available, from Royal Society Pairing to our STEM Futures Scheme, and more.
For a full list of all our schemes, including how to apply to each, check out our blog post on all our different offers.

Leadership mentoring  Those working towards Professional Recognition may also be interested in our leadership mentoring offer, which is available to line managers of all grades across GSE. To support leadership development and promote a mentoring and coaching culture within government, GSE Profession runs its ‘Empowering Leadership’ mentoring programme each year. GSE members are mentored over 6 months by other members to build their skills in empowering their teams and building high performance.
Email gse@go-science.gov.uk to register your interest in any of our mentorship or coaching offers!
